meanings.sent1: In the library, you can find books written by authors and books by nonauthors.
meanings.sent2: The book club invited authors to speak, but also welcomed nonauthors to join the discussion.
meanings.sent3: At the writing workshop, the nonauthors tried their hand at crafting stories with mixed results.
meanings.sent4: The literary event was a gathering of authors and nonauthors, each bringing their unique perspectives to the table.
meanings.sent5: The bookstore had a special section dedicated to nonauthors, showcasing a variety of voices and styles.

meanings.definition: Things that are not written by authors.
meanings.sent1: The library had a collection of books by authors and nonauthors alike.
meanings.sent2: Some literary works are attributed to famous authors, while others remain as creations of nonauthors.
meanings.sent3: The nonauthors in the story came to life, causing chaos in the fictional world.
meanings.sent4: The shelves were filled with books by authors, leaving little space for the works of nonauthors.
meanings.sent5: The bookstore proudly displayed a section dedicated to nonauthors, celebrating creativity in all forms.
